get.description: Landing page of the API. Entrypoint to which user can access product specifications, product applications and API documentation.
List STAC Collections available within the catalog.
Retrieves the generic metadata and attributes associated with a given Collection ID within the catalog. To see all available Collections, please refer to GET /collections.
Retrieves the entire dataset, represented as a Feature Collection, corresponding to a specified Collection ID.
Retrieves a specified imagery item from a Collection within the Catalog. The item will be represented as a Feature dataset.
List of queryables available for CQL2 filtering
Perform a search on the Catalog with your desired filters. Results will be returned as a Feature Collection. Both GET and POST methods are supported for this request.

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: Comma separated list of floats representing a bounding box. Only features that have a geometry that intersects the bounding box are selected.

schema.description: Comma separated list of floats representing a bounding box. Only features that have a geometry that intersects the bounding box are selected.

parameters.name: collections
parameters.description: Comma separated list of Collection IDs to include in the search for items. Only Item objects in one of the provided collections will be searched.

schema.description: Comma separated list of Collection IDs to include in the search for items. Only Item objects in one of the provided collections will be searched.

parameters.name: datetime
parameters.description: Single date+time, or a range ('/') separator, formatted to RFC3339 section 5.6. Use double dots for open ranges.

schema.description: Single date+time, or a range ('/') separator, formatted to RFC3339 section 5.6. Use double dots for open ranges.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Comma separated list of Item IDs to return.

schema.description: Comma separated list of Item IDs to return.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return per page.

schema.description: The maximum number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: sortby
parameters.description: An array of property names, prefixed by either '+' for ascending or '-' for descending. If no prefix is provided, '-' is assumed.

schema.description: An array of property names, prefixed by either '+' for ascending or '-' for descending. If no prefix is provided, '-' is assumed.

post.description: Perform a search on the Catalog with your desired filters. Results will be returned as a Feature Collection. Both GET and POST methods are supported for this request.

href.description: URI to the asset object. Can be relative or absolute.

raster:bands.description: Raster band statistics for the asset.

roles.description: The semantic roles of the asset.

title.description: The title of of the asset.

id.description: The identifier of the Collection, unique across the Catalog.

keywords.description: A list of keywords describing the Collection.

links.description: A list of references to other documents.

stac_extensions.description: A list of extension identifiers the Collection implements.

stac_version.description: The STAC version the Collection implements.

properties.description: A list of queryable properties to use as search filters.

field.description: The field that failed validation, for 'ValidationError' errors only.

id.description: A unique identifier for the type of error.

message.description: An error message describing what went wrong.

assets.description: Dictionary of asset objects that can be downloaded, each with a unique key.

bbox.description: Bounding Box of the asset represented by the Item.

collection.description: The ID of the Collection the Item references to.

id.description: The identifier of the Item, unique within the Collection that contains the Item.

links.description: A list of link objects to resources and related URLs.

gsd.description: Ground Sampling Distance. Distance in metres between two consecutive pixel centers measured on the ground.

price:value.description: Price of the image in minor units of the currency e.g. pence, cents.

proj:epsg.description: EPSG code. Defines the geographic coordinate system.

proj:shape.description: Number of pixels in Y and X directions for the default grid.

proj:transform.description: The affine transformation coefficients for the default grid.

satvu:image_withheld.description: Whether the image has ever been withheld for the contract.

satvu:publicly_available.description: Datetime at which the image was (or will be) made available for public consumption.

view:azimuth.description: Viewing azimuth angle. The angle between the scene centre and true north. Measured clockwise from north in degrees.

view:off_nadir.description: The angle between satellite nadir and the scene center. Measured in degrees.

view:sun_azimuth.description: Sun azimuth angle. The angle between truth north and the sun at the scene centre. Measured clockwise in degrees.

view:sun_elevation.description: Sun elevation angle. The angle from the tangent of the scene center to the sun.

stac_extensions.description: A list of extensions the Item implements.

stac_version.description: The STAC version the Item implements.

GeojsonGeometry.description: Defines the full footprint of the asset represented by the Item, formatted according to RFC 7946 section 3.1.

id.description: A unique identifier for the type of error.

message.description: An error message describing what went wrong.

body.description: A JSON object containing fields/values that must by included in the body of the next request.

href.description: The actual link in the format of an URL.

merge.description: If true, the body fields in the next link must be merged into the original request and be sent combined in the next request.

method.description: The HTTP method of the request, either GET or POST.

rel.description: The relationship between the current document and the linked document.

type.description: Media type of the referenced entity.

bbox.description: Array of floats representing a bounding box. Only features that have a geometry that intersects the bounding box are selected.

collections.description: Array of Collection IDs to include in the search for items. Only Item objects in one of the provided collections will be searched.

datetime.description: Single date+time, or a range ('/') separator, formatted to RFC3339 section 5.6. Use double dots for open ranges.

ids.description: Array of Item IDs to return.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return per page.

sortby.description: An array of objects containing a property name and sort direction.

conformsTo.description: A list of all conformance classes implemented.

bbox.description: Potential spatial extents covered by the Collection.

SpatialExtent.description: Potential spatial extents covered by the Collection.

links.description: A list of references to other documents.

stac_extensions.description: A list of extension identifiers the Catalog implements.

stac_version.description: The STAC version the Catalog implements.

links.description: A list of references to other documents.

numberMatched.description: Number of features matching the request filter.

numberReturned.description: Number of features in current page.

links.description: A list of references to other documents.

numberMatched.description: Number of features matching the request filter.

numberReturned.description: Number of features in current page.

direction.description: The direction to sort by, either 'asc' or 'desc'.

field.description: The name of the field to sort by.

coordinates.description: The coordinates of the Geometry object.

TypesStacGeometry.description: Searches items by performing intersection between their geometry and provided GeoJSON geometry.

interval.description: Potential temporal extents covered by the Collection.

TypesTemporalExtent.description: Potential temporal extents covered by the Collection.
